pr_title: #16852 reduce log, adapt tests to new return

timeline.message: #16852 reduce log, adapt tests to new return

timeline.author: dsilvam
dsilvam

timeline.bodyText: remove this, the method is not throwing a IOException anymore
timeline.author: freddyucv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -217,17 +217,20 @@ public DotTempFile createTempFileFromUrl(final String incomingFileName,
    * @return
    * @throws IOException

timeline.bodyText:
If we don't want this error in the logs I would remove it instead of change it to warn, is not a warning, is an error.
But to be honest I don't see the problem on having the extra error log in there.
timeline.author: jgambarios

replies.bodyText: I thought the same, more logs better but was a Bryan and Will call
replies.author: erickgonzalez

timeline.bodyText: We should handle the specific !=200 case instead of just catch any exception, we could be hiding real errors.
timeline.author: jgambarios

replies.bodyText: The CircuitBreakerUrl throws BadRequestException or DotRuntimeException, so the only way could be catching both exceptions.
replies.author: erickgonzalez
